text: @narendramodi How abt a word on how #COVID19 is planned to b contained domestically- distributing masks? How abt a word on how, in case of eventual lockdown, economically poor, elderly, emergency patients would b taken care of? How abt sick leaves for d 1 in jobs to b waived off? #Coronavirus
